Package de.oth.blocklib.disasters.volcanos

Class VolcanoManager

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.disasters.volcanos.VolcanoManager
public class VolcanoManager
extends java.lang.Object
A Singleton that is used for managing active volcanos. This class is not a part of the Context, since it is only required in this package. It can be used to create a VolcanoEruption Disaster.
Author:
Tobias Mueller
